name: Angry Politician: 2D Multiplayer
description:
Angry Politician is all about intense 2D multiplayer shooting combat!

Battle with up to 8 players online in this fun 2D India cartoon-themed cross between politicians, inspired by the original mini militia.

Now we add 2 maps Taj Mahal and Daravi but more maps coming soon.

Now players play with 8 weapons but more weapons coming soon.

Key features:

.Online multiplayer with up to 8 players

.Intuitive dual stick shooting controls

.Over 2 maps to explore 

.A wide range of modern and futuristic weapon types

.Offline mode with ai bots
